body.Body:
Hello SOC & Product Team,

We have a Security Incident for you with below details,

Alert Name- @{items('For_each')?['AlertName']}
Severity- @{items('For_each')?['AlertSeverity']}
Description - @{items('For_each')?['Description']}
ResourceID- @{items('For_each')?['ResourceId']}@{items('For_each')?['GetResouceIDhere']}

Please have a look on this.

Thank you.

-WSO2 Cloud Security Alerts-
body.Subject: [SENTINEL-ALERTS] @{items('For_each')?['AlertName']}-@{items('For_each')?['AlertSeverity']}

inputs.body:
SecurityAlert
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where SystemAlertId contains "@{variables('getsystemalertid')}"
| extend GetResouceIDhere = tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(tostring(parse_json(ExtendedProperties).["Custom Details"])).GetResourceID)))
| sort by TimeGenerated
| project AlertName, Description, GetResouceIDhere, ResourceId, AlertSeverity
